interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: essie Nail Polish, Glossy Shine Finish, Let It Glow, 0.46 fl. oz.
Review Date: 2017/10/10
Store: essie
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'get deserted in a fiery coral glistening with copper shimmer. DBP, Toluene, and Formaldehyde free provides flawless coverage along with outstanding durability inspired by the natural earth tone hues found in the desert America’s nail salon expert. since 1981become captivated by the desert’s optical illusions and transport yourself with our Essie desert mirage collection. From the warm morning sunrise to the hot sunsets, this collection brings to life the natural earth tone hues found in the desert. But regardless of temperature, these shades are guaranteed to keep you hot all season long!use apricot cuticle oil, Essie base coat, 2 coats of Essie polish, and seal with Essie top coat.Caution: keep from heat or flame.', 'Brand Story', 'For more than 30 years, essie has been an industry icon, trusted by beauty professionals, celebrities and even royalty – an American classic that allows women all over the world to express themselves and have fun with color.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Essie', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Color': 'Let It Glow', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'On-trend color with flawless coverage and outstanding durability. DBP, Toluene and Formaldehyde free', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '14 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.14 x 1.14 x 2.7 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ES2787', 'UPC': '095008027876', 'Manufacturer': 'essie'}
Review Text: The color shift isn't quite as pronounced in person, but it's still super pretty. In good light, the pink color flashes copper. The wear time is good too. The picture is after three days of wear and it still looks excellent.
Review Title: Pink shifts to copper!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Degree Male Adrenaline Series Anti-Perspirant and Deodorant Invisible Solid for Men, Overtime, 2.7 Ounce
DEGREE MENS DEO
{'Brand': 'DEGREE MENS DEO', 'Item Form': 'Solid', 'Scent': 'Cool Rush', 'Unit Count': '2.7 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '2.72 x 1.2 x 5.74 inches; 4.48 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Unilever'}
Exactly as advertised.  Lasted all day with great odor and wetness protection.  I also appreciated that the scent was subtle enough not to compete with my cologne.  I'll be buying this again.
Great, all day protection with a pleasantly subtle scent

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Grooming Product Preference:** Continues to show a strong preference for solid anti-perspirants and deodorants that offer all-day odor and wetness protection.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** Maintains a desire for subtle scents that complement rather than overpower other fragrances.
- **Brand Affinity:** Leans towards established brands known for their reliability, extending this preference to cosmetic products, including nail care.
- **Review Behavior:** Engages positively with products that meet or exceed their expectations, as reflected in their ratings. The user recently rated a nail polish positively, indicating satisfaction with both performance and aesthetic appeal.
- **Diversified Interests:** Shows an interest in beauty products beyond grooming essentials, valuing quality in areas like nail cosmetics, which aligns with their overall preference for well-established brands.
- **Replenishment Intent:** Willing to repurchase items that fulfill their needs, suggesting loyalty to brands that consistently perform well.

Overall, the user appreciates effective and reliable products across personal grooming and beauty categories, maintaining a focus on subtlety in scent and quality, and demonstrating a willingness to engage with trusted brands that deliver on performance.
